column5: They have been fined $8K but I think it should be double that.  https://www.theweathernetwork.com/news/articles/man-who-rode-moose-under-investigation/53226/
What a bunch of asses no respect for wildlife I agree they should of been fined more and the boat should of been confiscated also.
https://www.thesun.co.uk/news/1428622/two-men-could-face-up-to-a-year-in-jail-and-100000-after-riding-a-swimming-moose/  They got off easy? I wonder if they like paying for that awesome ride?
